description:
Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world’s Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp!  If Yugi doesn’t destroy the card, the virus program can’t be stopped – but Golden Castle of Stromberg can’t be destroyed by traps or spells!   How can Yugi destroy a card that was engineered for ultimate survival and optimal destruction?  KaibaCorp is on the edge of bankruptcy in the conclusion of the KC Grand Championship saga!
Source: crunchyroll
